website_summaries.verdict: Slip your foot into these knee-high, stretch microsuede boots and you won't be disappointed. The sleek and sexy over-the-knee look is versatile enough for daytime or nighttime wear.
pros: Stretchy material makes them easy to put on
Material is stiff enough so they don't slouch too much once they're on
The kind of boot you can wear all day long
cons: The top of the boot where the tie is can be a little wide on some women's legs

customer_reviews.title: Wrong I can wear them from the moment I get outside my house to the end of the day when I’m back home the best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hair stylist and stand on my feet all day long and still have to look professional. When I got these I thought they would be cute to wear for an hour and then I’ll take them off. Wrong I can wear them from the moment I get outside my house to the end of the day when I’m back home the best shoes !!! They look sexy on and they are sooo comfortable I bought two more pairs just so I will always have back ups
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST fitting boots I own, I'm 5'2" 125 lbs size 8 shoe (I ordered an 8.5 per reviews) and they fit slight roomy so an 8 would have been perfect they run true to size, but the leg part fits like a glove, I have 13.5" calves. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Comfy&attractive
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot!! The fit is comfortable. I've been wearing them for 2 days straight. (Just got them) They are a bit roomier in the toe box but I can work with that. I'm a 8.5 but an 8 would have fit as well. I wish I paid $34 though! I still think these are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitted and sexy
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8, ordered an 8 and it was perfect. It hugs your leg, goes up to just below knee. For any of you who have thin legs, these are your boots! Sexy and attractive! Bought the asphalt because they were on sale and I wasn’t sure about them. Now I want the other color! I live in south Florida and I can wear these easily now as they are thin going up the calf!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised there was a negative comment on these boots. I am almost 40 y.o., and they make me feel like 25 again. They are light, true to size (unlike some other Sam Edelman’s shoes), and very elegant for any age. The heel height makes them super comfy. They make my legs look so much more appealing. Yes, this is not natural suede, but I find it to be convenient. Genuine suede would take away from the smooth look. I totally love them and am going to post a picture in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: JMI

customer_reviews.title: Great style for a low, low price!
customer_reviews.text: For 34 bucks, these boots are fabulous! They look like suede, feel good on my feet, and the heel is substantial but manageable. I recommend them - especially for $34!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable but shaft was too loose
customer_reviews.text: This was attractive and comfortable. However, I had to return it because the shaft was too loose and kept slipping down. I thought the tie thing at the top could be tightened so the boot wouldn’t slide down, but sadly they could only be tightened a smidge and that was it. I even asked my husband to give the top tie thing a good tug but it appears to be merely decorative and to really made for tightening to get a secure fit. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Keel

customer_reviews.title: cute but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I liked these boots alot, but after only owning for 2 months, the heel split open on the corner....I expected more from this desinger brand, and the price, and I'm not someone with disposable income....I try to purchase very carefully for what my kids and I need.
customer_reviews.author: shari s.

customer_reviews.title: I kicked these boots to the curb
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really pretty, except it seems they slouch because of the half zipper. I prefer boots with a full zipper. Also for the short time I wore them they are attracted a lot of fuzz and fur. The heel height was comfortable, the boots are really pretty, I just didn’t like the little zipper. The company cheaped out on this aspect of the product
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Carmello

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Boots, but run large
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I typically wear a size 7, but they didn't have my size so bearing in mind that I would probably wear a thicker sock, I sized up to a 7.5, but they were just way too large. So sadly I'm returning them and ordering a 6.5 which is about $30 more! :/ But they are cute enough to pay a little more and fingers crossed they fit.
customer_reviews.author: felinefun

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but hard to take off and a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable to wear all day! I have narrow feets and they're a little tight in the mid-foot area which I've never experienced before. However, I don't think it makes sense to size up because of that considering they fit perfectly otherwise. However, if you have wider feet then maybe it makes sense. They're also difficult to take off because of how the zipper is placed but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alina_M

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Brware
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry, but if I’m going to spend $130 on a pair of boots, I kind of expect them to be new. They arrived today and the bottoms were so scratched up, they look as if they’ve been worn on the pavement for months. I returned them within 5 minutes of opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: birdbrainzz

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the calf is skinny and not loose like so many boots are now. The fabric is a bit more like velvet than suede but still nice. Easy to put on. Heel is comfortable. Priced a little high for the material but I’d still buy them again knowing what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, ties do NOT cinch - just decorative. Look like a pair of socks, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This boot is poorly made... they actually look like cheap velour socks. NOTE: THIS IS NOT AN OVER THE KNEE BOOT! Also, the ties at top do NOT cinch - just decorative... so how do you fit them to your calf OR hold them up? AND the size 9 is huge all the way around, footbed, heels, calf section, all loose, all UNcomfortable. Very bad, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot! Fit like a glove! I am a very small person with small ankles and calves. I purchased a 5M and wore a pair of socks. This boot was a perfect fit and comfortable! Great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are not sexy boots, since they have a round toe and a block heel. But the are beautiful, well made and I got a lot of compliments on my first day of wearing them. Another plus -- they have a wide toe box which left enough room for my big toe joint and cushioning that allowed me to wear them at work for more than 6 hours before I felt any pressure. The style is more of a classic or even a bohemian look which is quite versatile. The asphalt color is a dark gray, not bluish but with a warm, almost pink, undertone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Yuk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots! I've already received so many compliments on ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! I've already received so many compliments on them. Good quality for the price and they fit perfectly. Was a little worried they might be too narrow for my calves - I'm 5'8" and 135 for reference - but they work!
customer_reviews.author: msher

customer_reviews.title: Seems like faux suede but looks ok if you don’t see ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like faux suede but looks ok if you don’t see it right next to your eyes. Love the quality and circumstances which I always have issues but no ugly wrinkles were made around the ankles. Perfect for my winter boots!! True size but ordered 2 sz up so that I might wear socks or think leggings in it.
customer_reviews.author: "johann_won"

customer_reviews.title: Great for long thin legs
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6ft tall and very thin. I always have a hard time with knee high boots because they drown my calves. These boots fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Love these Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and good looking. Love them with a long cardigan and jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Golds

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The quality is decent, however they do run true to your size comparing to other Sam Edelman models I have which usually run half size smaller. Unfortunately circumstance is a bit too wide for my calves so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Really liked and fit amazing for small/skinny calfs. However the ties are an issue I could not get passed. Maybe if functional would feel different. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Great new addition to my fall/ winter wardrobe. These boots are comfortable so can wear all day at work and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great color and overall style. Takes a little extra effort to pull on and take off with shorter zipper but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these boot! The heel height is perfect and and the calf fit is snug. Definitely a "best buy".
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable stylish boot
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8.5 with a wide calf and these fit perfectly. I ordered dark grey and color is as expected. Good value for style ,comfort and price point.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Roman

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Wife loves the look and feel of them.
customer_reviews.author: BigSchlink

customer_reviews.title: Know the width of your feet
customer_reviews.text: I returned the medium width boots and ordered the wide width and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not Suede
customer_reviews.text: These would be great if they were actually black suede but they are not. They are fabric and it is obvious to look at them. Not worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, perfect fit, didn’t love the look
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots, comfortable, good fit, just didn’t like the way they looked on me. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! They fit perfect and are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots look very narrow out of the box but the material I stretchy so the boots fit perfectly. Love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: synthetic suede
customer_reviews.text: it is ok but is synthetic suede keep in mindp
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect !
customer_reviews.text: They are light and comfortable,and I am satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Dressy and comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of these boots. Wore them for an outdoor November wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Lebazzi

customer_reviews.title: I returned them
customer_reviews.text: I returned the boots the fit in calf was too loose boots would no stay up
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cohen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These went just below my knees (I'm 5'3"). They fit perfectly with leggings (too tight for denims) and are incredibly comfortable to wear and walk in. They're soft and look great. I have it in black and grey.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffster

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love my new boots. They've got beautiful lines, they're easy to put on, they fit nicely even around my hiker calves, and they're pretty good for walking. I feel awesome in these, stylish but comfortable, and they go well with lots of different outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D.

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so worth the price paid, I go between 9 and 9.5 so I went with the 9.5 and they fit perfectly. I have a calf diameter of about 15” and they work. They are stretchy suede so they fit like a glove. I love the block heel and they are very comfortable. Glad I got them; can’t wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye Lady

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! I've already received so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: nati

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, true to size and perfect for someone with a narrow to slim calf. The boot is even prettier in person, with a classy and soft suede fabric that doesnt look cheap. Great height block heel allowing you to be cute but comfortable, Im very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: CM

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Vinney Knee High Boot
product_meta.description:
Knee high stretch microsuede boot on a block heel

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.
feature_bullets: Versatile style can be worn from day to night
Versatile style can be worn from day to night
